promptTitle: Around the World in Eighty Minutes

ideas.name: Ethan
ideas.content: Greenland is the largest island in the world.

ideas.name: Andrew
ideas.content: Angel Falls, meaning 'waterfall of the deepest place' is a waterfall in Venezuela. It is the world's highest uninterrupted waterfall, with a height of 979 metres (3,212 ft) and a plunge of 807 metres (2,648 ft).

ideas.name: Albus PercivalWulfricBrianDumbledore
ideas.content: Saturn is not solid like Earth, but is instead a giant gas planet. It is made up of 94% hydrogen, 6% helium and small amounts of methane and ammonia. Hydrogen and helium are what most stars are made of. It is thought that there might be a molten, rocky core about the size of Earth deep within Saturn.
